import React from 'react'; import {BsFillMoonStarsFill} from 'react-icons/bs'; import { AiFillGithub } from "react-icons/ai" import resume from '../assets/DANIELEDWARDRESUME.pdf'; import me from '../assets/me.jpg' import { useState } from 'react'; export default function Profile() { const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false); return (

Daniel Edward Mwihoti

Frontend Developer

Are you looking to create a compelling and user-friendly website or web application that captivates your audience? Look no further! Besides that I love learning new things. I also have expertise on other areas like computer and hardware maintenance and troubleshooting. I have cisco certifications for CCNA.
